Sotiris, imo, in that view you are viewing only the light source and pfilt, by default, doesnt use light sources to obtain the image exposure, so pfilt cant get the image average exposure and shows that error, you can add pfilt=-a in your rif file to include the light source,


Regards
Ignacio
